Getting Started

Welcome to myapp.MBA!
 
What is myapp.MBA?
 
myapp.MBA provides you with a centralized portal that will help you manage all your MBA applications. 
 
Where do I start?
 
The Profile page contains a number of questions that would help you get started with your MBA application. These are questions that you will be asked in your application essays and interviews. Brainstorming the answers now and adding them to your profile will allow you to get a head start in the application process.  
 
What about the schools I am interested in?
 
Add the schools you are interested in, or planning on applying to, to your personal dashboard. The essay prompts and deadlines for each school will be populated once they are released by the schools. 
 
Add notes to the school’s dashboard as you talk to alumni, current students, admission officers and go on school visits. Keep track of the names of the people you talk to, and the specific programs or aspects about the school you are interested in.
All schools are interested in why you are applying to their program - use your notes to demonstrate the research you have done about the school and be specific when answering this question. 
 
How does myapp.MBA help with the essays?
 
Your application essays are a very important part of your MBA application. Your GPA and GMAT scores only form part of your application - the essays provide you with an opportunity to differentiate yourself from the thousands of other applicants to the program. 
 
myapp.MBA allows you to store all your essay drafts in your portal. If you use myapp.mba’s text editor while working on a new essay, you can refer to any of the drafts you have already worked on in a split view. Application essays for different schools have a lot of common themes - referring to essays you have already written while working on a new one will help you share elements between the essays. 
 
If you prefer to write your essay in Word, you can upload it to your dashboard. If you do happen to copy parts of an essay you have already written (say for Tuck) to the new essay you are writing (say for Kellogg), myapp.mba will scan the essay to make sure you have not accidentally left any references to Tuck in your Kellogg essay and vice versa. 
 
myapp.MBA also provides you with a proof reading service that catches all spelling and grammatical errors - it uses more than 1700 patterns for finding errors and does a more exhaustive job than a Microsoft Word spell check. 
 
How can I get feedback for my essay?
 
Once you have uploaded your essay your dashboard - you can send it to any of your friends or family to review, right from the portal itself. They will get an email with your essay and can leave their comments on a personalized portal for them. You will be notified when they have reviewed your essay, and you can view the feedback you received in the portal itself. 
 
If you want your essay to be reviewed by an expert, you can pick from our list of professional consultants or current MBA students and get your essays reviewed for a fee. 
 
What about my resume?
 
You can upload your resume and get it scored by our portal. We are using an AI and machine learning driven tool to analyze and score your essay. If you would like an expert to evaluate your resume, you can reach out to a consultant or an MBA student to get their perspective. 
 
How should I go about my recommendations?
 
You should reach out to your potential recommenders at least a month or two before your application deadline. This will give them plenty of time to work on your recommendation. 
 
We will be releasing an ‘export’ feature in the profile page that will allow you to export all the answers you have worked on to a PDF. We suggest you send this PDF to your recommenders, as this will give them an idea of your interests and also remind them of your accomplishments, and will help them draft your recommendation. 
 
Will myapp.MBA use my essays or information?
 
myapp.MBA will not use or sell your information, essays, details to anyone for any purpose. We will keep your information safe using encryption or other appropriate security controls. 
 
 
Questions? 
 
Reach out to hello@myapp.mba for any questions / concerns you may have.
